title: "One Direction is who we are and always will be": Liam Payne makes surprise appearance at BRIT Awards 2017 as band beats Zayn Malik
text:

One Direction fans had a special surprise at tonight’s BRIT Awards when Liam Payne popped up out of nowhere to accept the band’s prize for Video of the Year. 
The boyband scooped the audience voted prize over ex-member Zayn Malik, who had also been nominated for his debut solo track, Pillowtalk. 
Liam, who is widely rumoured to be expecting a baby with girlfriend Cheryl, didn’t walk the red carpet at London’s O2 Arena so not many people knew he was actually in the audience. 
But when Simon Cowell and Nicole Scherzinger announced 1D had won Video of the Year for their song History, out popped Liam! 
Naturally, Twitter freaked out. Liam Payne accepting the prize from Simon Cowell and Nicole Scherzinger (Photo: Getty Images) Liam thanked the 1D fan base (Photo: PA) 
And they freaked out even more when he hinted that the band would never split for good, saying: “We’ve been taking time out to work on solo material but One Direction is who we are and who we always will be, so this one is for us.” 
Liam added: “This is amazing, thank you so much. I know I speak on behalf of the rest of the boys when I say we can’t believe we’re still winning these. Thank you very very much.” 
Fans took to Twitter to express hope that Liam’s comments about 1D always being a band meant there was still hope their temporary hiatus may not become permanent. Liam was solo on stage (Photo: Getty Images) 
Other fans were thrilled to see the band win but sad that Liam was accepting the award alone, with no Niall Horan, Harry Styles or Louis Tomlinson by his side. 
Meanwhile, the other 1D stars who weren't at the show took to Twitter to thank fans for voting them as winners. 
Niall Horan tweeted: "Oh my days...time and time again you guys do it for us . Payno love ya bro." 
Louis Tomlinson added: “I’m watching the BRITS back home in Doncaster. Absolutely incredible. I’ve said it so many times but you guys continue to surprise us with how incredible you are over and over again. This means a hell of a lot to all of us. You are incredible, thank you so much.”
